verses.translation: The Most Merciful
Taught the Qur'an,
Created man,
[And] taught him eloquence.
The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
And the stars and trees prostrate.
And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
That you not transgress within the balance.

verses.arabic: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.arabicSimple: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
verses.transliteration: Wa aqeemul wazna bilqisti wa laa tukhsirul meezaan

verses.translation: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
verses.transliteration: Feehaa faakihatunw wan nakhlu zaatul akmaam

verses.translation: And grain having husks and scented plants.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.arabicSimple: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
verses.transliteration: Wa khalaqal jaaan mim maarijim min naar

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
[He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
verses.transliteration: Yakhruju minhumal lu 'lu u wal marjaanu

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
verses.translation: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
verses.transliteration: Wa lahul jawaaril mun sha'aatu fil bahri kal a'laam

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
Everyone upon the earth will perish,

verses.arabic: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.arabicSimple: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
verses.transliteration: Wa yabqaa wajhu rabbika zul jalaali wal ikraam

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.arabicSimple: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
verses.transliteration: Yas'aluhoo man fissamaawaati walard; kulla ywmin huwa fee shaan

segments.translation: Asks Him whoever is in the heavens and the earth
Every day He is in a matter

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ
verses.arabicSimple: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ
verses.translation: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
verses.transliteration: Yaa ma'sharal jinni wal insi inis tata'tum an tanfuzoo min aqtaaris samaawaati wal ardi fanfuzoo; laa tanfuzoona illaa bisultaan

segments.arabic: يَـٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ
segments.translation: O assembly of the jinn and the men If you are able to pass beyond [of] the regions of the heavens and the earth then pass
segments.transliteration: yāmaʿshara l-jini wal-insi ini is'taṭaʿtum an tanfudhū min aqṭāri l-samāwāti wal-arḍi fa-unfudhū

segments.translation: Not you can pass except by authority

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.arabicSimple: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
verses.transliteration: Yursalu 'alaikumaa shuwaazum min naarifiw-wa nuhaasun falaa tantasiraan

words.translation: you will (be able to) defend yourselves

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.arabicSimple: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
verses.transliteration: Fa-izan shaqqatis samaaa'u fakaanat wardatan kaddihaan

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.arabic: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.arabicSimple: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
verses.transliteration: Fa-yawma'izil laa yus'alu 'an zambiheee insunw wa laa jaann

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
verses.arabicSimple: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
verses.transliteration: Yu'raful mujrimoona biseemaahum fa'yu'khazu binna waasi wal aqdaam

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.arabicSimple: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
verses.transliteration: Haazihee jahannamul latee yukazzibu bihal mujrimoon

verses.translation: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
verses.transliteration: Yatoofoona bainahaa wa baina hameemim aan

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
verses.transliteration: Wa liman khaafa maqaama rabbihee jannataan

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
Having [spreading] branches.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are two springs, flowing.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
verses.transliteration: Muttaki'eena 'alaa furushim bataaa'inuhaa min istabraq; wajanal jannataini daan

segments.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ
segments.translation: Reclining on couches whose inner linings are of brocade
segments.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā furushin baṭāinuhā min is'tabraqin

segments.translation: and the fruit of both the gardens is near

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.arabicSimple: فِيهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
verses.transliteration: Feehinna qaasiratut tarfi lam yatmishunna insun qablahum wa laa jaaann

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
As if they were rubies and coral.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
Dark green [in color].
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are two springs, spouting.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
verses.transliteration: Feehimaa faakihatunw wa nakhlunw wa rummaan

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
In them are good and beautiful women -
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
Fair ones reserved in pavilions -
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.arabic: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.arabicSimple: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّ
verses.translation: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
verses.transliteration: Lam yatmis hunna insun qablahum wa laa jaaann

verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.arabicSimple: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِىٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.translation: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

verses.arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.arabicSimple: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِى ٱلْجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
